column5: Just a plug for a member that seviced my 2 Abu C3's.  They squeeled like crazy casting my muskie baits.  Found Ah_long on this site.  He is in Markham.  Tried the reels this weekend.  They are sparkling clean  and perform like new.  Nice guy and fair price  Peter
I second Ah_long's reel service. I just hope he never moves from the Markham area!
It's been a while since I've last seen him, so better to contact him directly. He doesn't bite.
Thanks for your kind words Peter. It was a pleasure working on those reels of yours!
He charged $25 per reel.  No parts needed
